languages.text: {n}Лицо Джаспера выражает яростную внутреннюю борьбу и, наконец, он азартно выпаливает:{/n} "И знаете, что я думаю? Странно это, что благословенный Каллигос не отдал ему наш мир в управление. Почтенный Эвейн же его кровь, а правит нами губернатор! Чего он его тогда сюда послал? Я думаю, что это — ссылка!"

{n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Джаспера выражает яростную внутреннюю борьбу и, наконец, он азартно выпаливает:{/n} "И знаете, что я думаю? Странно это, что благословенный Каллигос не отдал ему наш мир в управление. Почтенный Эвейн же его кровь, а правит нами губернатор! Чего он его тогда сюда послал? Я думаю, что это — ссылка!"

Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who governs us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he exiled him!"

Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

languages.text: {n}In Jaspars Miene lässt sich ein innerer Konflikt ablesen, ehe er herausplatzt:{/n} "Und wisst Ihr, was ich denke? Ich finde es merkwürdig, dass der gesegnete Calligos ihn nicht zum Herrscher über unsere Welt gemacht hat. Lord Evayne ist sein Blutsverwandter, aber der Gouverneur herrscht über uns! Was glaubt Ihr, warum er ihn dann hergeschickt hat? Ich glaube, er wurde ins Exil geschickt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}In Jaspars Miene lässt sich ein innerer Konflikt ablesen, ehe er herausplatzt:{/n} "Und wisst Ihr, was ich denke? Ich finde es merkwürdig, dass der gesegnete Calligos ihn nicht zum Herrscher über unsere Welt gemacht hat. Lord Evayne ist sein Blutsverwandter, aber der Gouverneur herrscht über uns! Was glaubt Ihr, warum er ihn dann hergeschickt hat? Ich glaube, er wurde ins Exil geschickt!"

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Jaspar se crispe, puis il laisse échapper :{/n} « Vous savez ce que je pense ? Je trouve étrange que le très saint Calligos ne l'ait pas nommé souverain de notre monde. Le seigneur Evayne est de son sang, mais c'est le gouverneur qui nous dirige, sinon pourquoi l'aurait-il envoyé ici, à votre avis ? Pour moi, il l'a bel et bien exilé ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Jaspar se crispe, puis il laisse échapper :{/n} « Vous savez ce que je pense ? Je trouve étrange que le très saint Calligos ne l'ait pas nommé souverain de notre monde. Le seigneur Evayne est de son sang, mais c'est le gouverneur qui nous dirige, sinon pourquoi l'aurait-il envoyé ici, à votre avis ? Pour moi, il l'a bel et bien exilé ! »

languages.text: {n}贾斯帕脸上露出了古怪的表情，显然心里非常纠结。到最后，他开了口。{/n}“您知道我在想什么吗？我觉得很奇怪，对受祝福的卡里戈斯大人而言，艾维尼大人明明是他的骨肉，可他却没有让艾维尼大人来统治这个世界，反而让那个总督说了算！您觉得，他为什么要把艾维尼大人派到这种地方呢？我猜艾维尼大人肯定是被流放过来的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}贾斯帕脸上露出了古怪的表情，显然心里非常纠结。到最后，他开了口。{/n}“您知道我在想什么吗？我觉得很奇怪，对受祝福的卡里戈斯大人而言，艾维尼大人明明是他的骨肉，可他却没有让艾维尼大人来统治这个世界，反而让那个总督说了算！您觉得，他为什么要把艾维尼大人派到这种地方呢？我猜艾维尼大人肯定是被流放过来的！”

languages.text: {n}ジャスパーの顔は、内面の激しい葛藤を口より早く語りだす。{/n}「僕はですね、カリゴス様がエヴァイン卿をこの星の統治者に据えなかったのが気になるんですよ。エヴァイン卿はカリゴス様の血縁者なのに、総督が僕らを支配してるなんて！それならなんでエヴァイン卿をここに派遣したんでしょう？家を追われたんじゃないかって思うんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジャスパーの顔は、内面の激しい葛藤を口より早く語りだす。{/n}「僕はですね、カリゴス様がエヴァイン卿をこの星の統治者に据えなかったのが気になるんですよ。エヴァイン卿はカリゴス様の血縁者なのに、総督が僕らを支配してるなんて！それならなんでエヴァイン卿をここに派遣したんでしょう？家を追われたんじゃないかって思うんです！」

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Jaspar muestra una feroz lucha interna antes de que diga,{/n} «¿Y sabe lo que pienso? Me parece curioso que el Calligos sagrado no le hiciera gobernante de nuestro mundo. ¡Lord Evayne es de su sangre, pero es el gobernador quien nos gobierna! ¿Entonces por qué cree que lo envió aquí? ¡Creo que lo han exiliado!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Jaspar muestra una feroz lucha interna antes de que diga,{/n} «¿Y sabe lo que pienso? Me parece curioso que el Calligos sagrado no le hiciera gobernante de nuestro mundo. ¡Lord Evayne es de su sangre, pero es el gobernador quien nos gobierna! ¿Entonces por qué cree que lo envió aquí? ¡Creo que lo han exiliado!».

languages.text: {n}Jaspar'ın yüzü, dobralığını bastırmaya çalıştığını gösteriyor ama nafile.{/n} "Ya aslında olay bir garip. Mübarek Calligos onu niye dünyamızın yöneticisi yapmıyor anlamıyorum. Kanından olan Lord Evayne ama bizi yöneten vali! E madem öyle Lord Evayne neden buraya geldi? Bence sürüldü!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jaspar's face betrays a fierce inner struggle before he blurts out,{/n} "You know what I think? I find it curious that blessed Calligos didn't make him the ruler of our world. Lord Evayne is his blood, but it's the governor who rules us! Then why do you think he sent him here? I think he's been exiled!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaspar'ın yüzü, dobralığını bastırmaya çalıştığını gösteriyor ama nafile.{/n} "Ya aslında olay bir garip. Mübarek Calligos onu niye dünyamızın yöneticisi yapmıyor anlamıyorum. Kanından olan Lord Evayne ama bizi yöneten vali! E madem öyle Lord Evayne neden buraya geldi? Bence sürüldü!"
